website_summaries.verdict: Aside from wrestlers, many fans use the Otomix Ninja Warrior for other physically intense activities like boxing and weight training. Its thin sole construction helps with the overall pliability of the footwear. This low-profile unisole also keeps the foot steady and planted firmly on the ground.Meanwhile, its upper keeps the foot comfortably snug and aids in the ankle hold. This lightweight trainer is highly recommended by its owners.
pros: The Otomix Ninja Warrior feels good to wrestle in, says a majority of the reviewers
Multiple wrestlers like the ankle support delivered by the high top construction
Many shoppers mention getting more than what they paid for with this wrestling shoe
The versatility of this model for various indoor activities pleases numerous athletes
A good number of users are impressed with the grippy outsole
The lightweight build of the footgear made it easy for plenty of wearers to move quickly on the mat
This product is described as great-looking by a lot of buyers
More than a few testers state that this seems like a sturdier version of the Otomix Stingray
cons: A minority of the owners have a few complaints about this wrestling trainer’s durability
According to some individuals, the memory foam insole quickly lost its cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Stingrays For Lifting
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these for lifting. I'm a person who usually has a problem with wide/flat feet, but these address the issue without any concerns. I once trained with the otomix stingrays and ultimate trainers, but I had an issue that forced me to buy half a size bigger (which resulted to me having some room near the toebox). Training legs wasn't normally a problem, but hitting calves was sometimes more difficult than it should have been. The ninja model is meant to address this issue for people that specifically train with weights, but none of my friends have been able to vouch for them since they didn't want to be the guinae pig to test them out.
customer_reviews.author: A Filthy Peasant

customer_reviews.title: Repost...
customer_reviews.text: Love the color scheme. Perfect fit. But I have a narrow foot, so if your foot runs wide, this may not work for you. Repost...I gave it 5 stars originally. But for what I paid I expected a more quality product. (Note pic)! I ordered them in mid October for a meet in December. So I didn't even wear them until December. Since then, I've only worn a handful of times so I'm disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba Reams

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Boxing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Otomix is an excellent pair of boxing shoes. It's made of good materials and comfortable when worn. The sole is thick enough for on to do jump ropes on most floors. When worn, it's soft on the inside, the user will feel its grip when sparring or in a real match. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jack Angel

customer_reviews.title: Otomix Training shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes appear to be well constructed. When I laced them up support was great and the stability is very good. They fit well for my size 13, however, the width seems a bit tight. It they came in wide I would buy them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Very good pair of Boxing Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I put them on they feel really light, when putting them it’s like cloud. They support my ankle just fine, I also lift with these on but I don’t lift light or heavy just somewhere between the two since I have to get my optimal weight between Super Middleweight to Light Heavyweight. But I hear really good reviews for wrestling and lifting so cop a pair if you haven’t already! For boxing, great support, I could pivot better, great traction and grip. But if I were you, find the right size for you just in case. I have narrow feet with a little bit of width so they fit great so keep in mind about sizing. Great pair nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: otomix quality in all areas of business is a lower quality than Ive experienced in the past.
customer_reviews.text: The product was not what I expected. I didn't realized they were more of a wresting shoe, not a gym shoe. I returned them and have not got a confirmation that they received the returned shoes. I ordered a second pair different style and received a different shoe than what I ordered. I returned the second pair and have not got a response on those either. I was told the pair I wanted was out of stock. Its a little disappointing. Not sure if I will order this brand again, I have ordered this brand several times in the past and was happy but the last style I received didn't hold up well and now this .
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Peterson

customer_reviews.title: fit true to size and I absolutely love them. Had my first leg day with them ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came very neatly placed and wrapped inside the box, fit true to size and I absolutely love them. Had my first leg day with them today and I have to say otomix did a fantastic job with these. Thank you otomix for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: That Broski

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: The ad says it will do exchanges but when it arrived it said “final sale”. Compared to other shoes there are better brands out there for cheaper. I was disappointed with the fit and they are hard to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie G

customer_reviews.title: I always wear in the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great product, comfortable, I just love these boots. Spend the money you won’t regret it. I’m a serious lifter and if you’re doing squats, deadlifts, you want the stability of being barefoot not in a cushy sneaker. Believe me it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Richard Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great purpose built shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great purpose built shoe. Has been going strong for 7 months now. Memory foam insole fell apart, but I didn't buy them for comfort. Still 5 stars because the shoes have lasted very well, working out 6 days a week, doing everything i've asked of them
customer_reviews.author: Lee Christian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deadlift shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the gym and casual wear. Perfect for deadlifts. I get compliments about them daily. I did have to send the first pair back to go up a half size. The fit is tight but they do break in after a few days. I’ll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Bad insoles.
customer_reviews.text: After only two workouts, the memory foam insoles are compeletly destroyed. They have three layers, the insole base which is hard foam, the memory foam layer, and then a fabric covering the foam. All three have separated. Wide toe box was supposed to be the star feature of this shoes, yet it still fails to ample room for free toe movement. The rest of the shoe fits great, until it gets sweaty and all that extra padding loses its form.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, I have worn them extensively and they seem durable enough to stand up to my training regemin, very comfortable and I get compliments on them all the time. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Fodera Jr

customer_reviews.title: my review for these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked how comfortable these shoes feel especially when I'm training with squats or deadlifts, and feel very secure to the ground beneath me as well as other athletic movements. finally gave me good arch support for my ankles especially being a tall guy. Definitely recommend these shoes to anyone looking to improve their training capabilities and was reasonable priced for the shoes as well as quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: James Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for sure 😌
customer_reviews.text: This.l is pretty cool. These are honestly made for comfort and they do just the job. I didn't feel the least bit of discomfort in my workouts with these on and I'm flat footed. They even helped my squat performance increase. As far as style goes, they are bulky and a but funny looking, but that's totally fine for someone like me. I just wanted the comfort. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice product just needs a little bit of work.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. Just a little bit more roomy in the toe box than I like. Seems like it’s lacking support. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: The Q-Man

customer_reviews.title: GET SOME NINJA WARRIORS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! Most comfortable trainers I’ve ever worn. The memory foam is great. Fit for the wider foot is a plus. Very solid construction and materials. Aesthetic design. I feel very planted in them while lifting. Excellent grip. I want another pair!!! Thanks Otomix!!
customer_reviews.author: M i k a w a

customer_reviews.title: great fit, great feel, sizing accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love these, have couple of pairs of Otomix. These are for training only in my case. Fit is spot on, comfortable with moderate ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: But then I took the insoles (which were almost twice the thickness of a regular insole) out and put in small half insole and the shoes fit great.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 and have a wide toe. I had Otomix years ago and 9.5 was too big. I bought these in a 9 and they were too small. But then I took the insoles (which were almost twice the thickness of a regular insole) out and put in small half insole and the shoes fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Worden

customer_reviews.title: Best weight lifting shoes I ever owned will never train ...
customer_reviews.text: Best weight lifting shoes I ever owned will never train with out them feather light perfect for my Long wide flat feet made for squatting and dead lifting will be getting another pair just to rock there are that comfortable
customer_reviews.author: justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best boxing training shoes that I have ever purchased!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! I have a bad ankle so they are just what I needed for the gym!!!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Great Martial arts/training shoe for very wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet. I need good mat shoes for martial arts. I can't find a wrestling shoe that fits my thick boats but these do. I also like that I feel the support of a shoe with the litheness of training as if in bare feet. Really works for me
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Schane

customer_reviews.title: I wear womans shoes 10, so 8.5 it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: arrived exactly as described, and in the correct timeframe! I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet approved
customer_reviews.text: I finally found my go-to boxing shoes. I have wide feet and spent the longest time looking for shoes that would fit. They are really comfortable too. I know the plush padding will eventually flatten out but it really doesn't matter since it is still a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Luis J Valcarcel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, fits proper
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, fits proper, light and flexible - Perfect for lifers! Do these shoes provide good arch support? - it's not designed for it...
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect but by the 2nd day the back end of the shoe was ripping:(
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to tell how well they will hold up but I like the fit and they have the ideal grip for training martial arts. Not too sticky and definitely not slick at all! I really like the padding around the ankle area of the shoe which adds to the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect. love the bounce in them as well
customer_reviews.author: UFOCG

customer_reviews.title: I love them! So comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love them! So comfortable and light weight. Will be ordering more when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Really cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: OMG these shoes are the most comfortable one I ever had! They really worth the price. I use them every day!
customer_reviews.author: ElChaparro

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Otomix never disappoints. Attempted to purchase direct, and they were out of stock. As usual - Amazon came through!!!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: super sexy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just sexy , super sexy shoes... they are very comfortable , love the ankle support , most comfortable shoes I have ever worn in my life , feels like I'm working out in house slippers
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Rediculously comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No complaints whatsoever. Fit was perfect. Light weight but supportive. Got them for the gym but will probably wear them around for a bit then use them in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: A half a size more would’ve been a better fit
customer_reviews.author: oleschool

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers extremely light and comfortable want to definitely purchase other colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Otomix product, i am totally pleased with both.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit so comfortable and also new PR'S NEED I SAY MORE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes got them last night perfect fit and extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes got them last night perfect fit and extremely comfortable can't wait to get to the gym today, they look bas ass too, would recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Tirso Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow and inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: Its too narrow and for that price the shoe did not last long. The stitches started to unravel and the sole began to come apart like it was made from inferior materials. This is my second pair of otomix shoes and they both ended up the same way after a couple of months of use. I previously had the the otomix ultimate trainer. Would not recommend these shoes if you squat heavy or go heavy on the leg press.
customer_reviews.author: Bankai23.02

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size and a good fit, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Efediyi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 and that is what I ordered. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: The best custom made Sport footwear!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort! Excellent fit and Workmanship! Superior quality! I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William l Helm

customer_reviews.title: the fact that they were wider around the toes made it so they fit him perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my brother, the fact that they were wider around the toes made it so they fit him perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Atwell

customer_reviews.title: ... gotten a lot of compliments and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: have gotten a lot of compliments and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: ... gotten a lot of compliments and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: have gotten a lot of compliments and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend wears a 10 and that was the size ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wears a 10 and that was the size he got and its about half a inch big on him but hes making it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Design and finish are good. The sole is nice and low and stitched on. The ankle is generously padded which helps if you are kickboxing and getting your kicks checked. However, while training in these shoes for the third time only, the right tongue came completely off the shoe while I was wearing it. The tongue was held on with only a single stitch and no reinforcement. These will be great shoes if Otomix stops cutting corners on the most structurally important bits of the shoe. This is the same problem with every other brand I've tried: style over durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy another pair for Marshal Art!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way to large! Not very good quality in the workmanship!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L Warnken

customer_reviews.title: Shoes lasted two weeks before falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After just two weeks, one of the soles became unglued to the shoe. Over $120 for a shoe that lasted two weeks. Very poor quality. Don't believe the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Aikens

product_meta.title: Otomix Ninja Warrior Red White Blue Unisex Shoes
product_meta.description: OTOMIX brings its heritage of mat sports experience in Martial Arts to the world of Wrestling, MMA, Grappling with the introduction of the MMA Stingray Escape shoe. These ultra light shoes provide superior support and stability with unlimited range of motion. The MMA Stingray Escape is feather light with ultimate traction for competition. Ideal for all grappling sports, jujitsu, judo, boxing, wrestling, and Mixed Martial Arts.
